title: [Control systems] ABB security advisory (AV25-169)
description: On March 27, 2025, ABB published security advisories to address vulnerabilities in the following products:
products: ACS880 Primary Control Program  version AINLX prior to 3.47 and version YINLX prior to 1.30
ACS880 IGBT Supply Control Program  multiple versions
ACS880 Position Control Program  version APCLX 1.04.0.5 and prior.
ACS880 Test Bench Control Program  version ATBLX 3.44.0.0 and prior
DCT880 memory unit incl. ABB Drive Application Builder license (IEC 61131-3)  version 3ADT786242R0101
DCT880 memory unit incl. Power Optimizer  version 3ADT786242R0201
DCS880 memory unit incl. ABB Drive Application Builder license (IEC 61131-3)  version 3ADT786251R0101
DCS880 memory unit incl. DEMag  version 3ADT786251R0201
DCS880 memory unit incl. DCC  version 3ADT786251R0401
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
